entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:46 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
Temperature: 0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: S 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:41 PM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
